content.raw:
Thanks for the tips. It's good to have clarification about which parts of Gazebo I should internalize as good code practices and which parts we are slowly revising.

My thought in adding a velocity attribute to Camera was in case we implement more ViewControllers in the future (or other developers implement ViewControllers) that set the velocity of the camera. It also seemed like a natural choice to add a velocity component to Camera, since it has functions for change the rotation and translation of the camera. However, it sounds like I misinterpreted the intended functionality of Camera vs. ViewController.

... the note about PIMPL would have been good to know before I started working on the Haptix GUIPlugin, but we can discuss that in another thread.
